# Load packages
```{r load-packages}
library(sp)
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
library(FedData)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r polygon}
# need to change location 
vepPolygon <- polygon_from_extent(raster::extent(672800, 740000, 4102000, 4170000),
                                  proj4string = "+proj=utm +datum=NAD83 +zone=12")
```
